sig_info: At the start of each fight, inflict +1 Living Abyss Debuffs on the Opponent for every 6 signature levels obtained. Max 15.
When Corruption activates, gain an Unstoppable and Unblockable Buff for 2 second(s).
While Corruption is active and the Opponent has 10.12 to 40% Health or less, when they would gain a Regeneration Effect, replace it with Knull's Degeneration Debuff.
